contents.markdown: In the previous lesson we learned _nasaan_, the Tagalog word for “where” which is used with nouns. This lesson is about _saan_, the word used with verbs.

item.english: Where did he think of the question?

contents.markdown: Standard Sentence + location. (Tag.) = Standard Sentence at location. (Eng.)

item.english: Maria is going to the restroom.

item.tagalog: Naisip niya sa Seattle ang tanong.
item.english: He thought of the question in Seattle.
We (excl.) will bicycle in the street.

contents.markdown: For a negative answer, you use hindi:
\*\*Hindi\*\*+ Standard Sentence + location. (Tag.) = Negated Standard Sentence at location. (Eng.)

item.tagalog: Hindi pumupunta si Maria sa eskwelahan.
item.english: Maria is not going to school.

item.tagalog: Hindi niya naisip sa Cebu ang tanong.
item.english: He did not think of the question in Cebu.
We (excl.) will not bicycle in Manila.

contents.markdown: Unlike direct family members, family members by marriage, such as _asawa_, are marked like common nouns:

exampleSentences.tagalog: Saan napunta ang asawa ni Diego nung ikapito ng Agosto?
exampleSentences.english: Where did Diego's wife wind up on the 7th of August?

exampleSentences.tagalog: Hindi siya napunta sa CR sa atin.
exampleSentences.english: She did not wind up in the restroom at our (incl.) place.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Saan nakikita nina Angel at Maria ang tanong namin?
exampleSentences.english: Where do Angel and Maria see our (excl.) question?

exampleSentences.tagalog: Nakikita nila ang tanong sa lamesa sa amin.
exampleSentences.english: They see the question on the table at our (excl.) place.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Saan ka matutulog sa hapon? Sa murang bahay ng asawa mo?
exampleSentences.english: Where will you sleep in the afternoon? In your wife's cheap house?

exampleSentences.tagalog: Natutulog lang ako dun nang anim na beses bawat taon.
exampleSentences.english: I only sleep there six times per year.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Saan maiisip ni Analyn ang petsa para sa amin?
exampleSentences.english: Where will Analyn think of the (calendar) date for us (excl.)?

exampleSentences.tagalog: Hindi siya magbibigay ng petsa sa inyo.
exampleSentences.english: She will not give you (pl.) a date.

exampleSentences.tagalog: Saan mo naalala ang tanong nila?
exampleSentences.english: Where did you remember their question?

exampleSentences.tagalog: Naalala ko ang tanong nila sa CR sa kanila.
exampleSentences.english: I remembered their question in the restroom at their place.
